title: The heroic trollish saga
data:
*This page is a [Diary of a Crawler](/Category:Diary_of_a_Crawler "Category:Diary of a Crawler"), the journal of an individual character. This page probably contains spoilers.*

This diary has been made by Newtkiller. I recently discovered a fade in my afinity for demonspawn. I realised that I lived much longer when I was a troll. So I decided to focus on these species. Here are the trollish heroic sagas!

## Contents

- [1 The troll berserkers](#The_troll_berserkers)

  - [1.1 Newtkiller, the untitled](#Newtkiller.2C_the_untitled)

    - [1.1.6 Level 6](#Level_6)

# The troll berserkers

## Newtkiller, the untitled

### Level 1

Okay, Dungeons here i come. This level passes as a brease, with the NOTABLE exception of a kobold wielding a short sword of venom... frightening. As usual with trolls, I slay everything in my path, eating all the corpses I find. Discoveries of level one : scroll of teleportation, potion of healing & potion of restore abilities Interesting thins in inventory : an encrusted granite ring, a small golden amulet, a +2 shield (which I won't wearbecause it prevents me from moving well) and a glowing elven short sword of venom (which sounds interesting, but I keep to my claws for the moment. Also, an evolution to level 2.

### Level 2

After beating a rat, kobold an giant mite which were groupped together (thanks for regeneration against posoin, I survived), I evolve to lvl 3. Since my intelligence of 2 seems a bit shabby should there be something dangerous later, I augment my intelligence. And my racial bonus to strength comes along. Two more identifications, the potion of confusion and the one of slowing. Thanfully, there was no one there when I drank them. Cool, a hobgobelin gave me the power to get regeneration. But I already have that... A scroll of detect curse now\... both pieces of jewellery are uncursed so I put them on. Also an uncrease to level 4 in unarmed combat... these claws are good... A scroll which does nothing when pressed... strange. And a golden ring. Now level 3

### Level 3

First whimpy monster on that level gives me my fourth level. Chunks of raw orc finally manage to fill my stomach. My god is now going to eat a little... since i found only one stair going down on this level, i go back up and through another stair... And SURPRISE : 4 orcs, an orc warrior, a jackal, a Kobold, an a rat come to greet me. A little rage, and they die, including all the ones whoa came to battle... my skin is soaked with blood, and I feel like resting a little. While doing that, I givesome sacrifices to my god (normal, he gave me the power to kill them.

### Level 4

The staircase to the Temple is the only thing new here.

### Level 5

Found a book. Keeping it to block a way with fire later.

### Level 6

A giant eyeball, I hate those guys. Nothing better fo YASD. Found a shiny steel ring. Another increase in attributes, and I increase my mind (again.) Found what potions of levitation were. First shop : general store, with lots of carp which I buy to know what it is, and a wand of disintegration which I can't buy. I'll come back later then. Another shop, a wand one this time. lots of interesting things here, but I don't have the money. I save for later. Now Ijjyb, SOOOOO easy to defeat... And dead, a potion of degeneration turned my brain to wood.

# Comments
